Key Match Events: Herro missed his first four 3-point attempts, then threw a terrible alley-oop lob that he intended for Butler late in the first half. The pass went in — for three points, which technically became the first of five straight makes for Herro from beyond the arc.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trey Murphy III scored 34 for the Pelicans, who played on the same day that at least 15 people were killed in New Orleans when a truck drove into a crowd of New Year's revelers on Bourbon Street in an attack that President Joe Biden described as “despicable.”
The Pelicans have dropped 15 in a row on the road. It's the 100th time in NBA history that a team has had a road losing streak of 15 or more in the same season.
